title: march 11: the history of pandemic 1.0
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the OG pandemic: The Spanish Influenza of 1918. Over the course of two years, the Spanish Flu killed 675,000 Americans and 50 million people worldwide — Maia digs into the flu’s history and the lessons gleaned from that pandemic. Afterwards, she talks about Corpse’s hit track, “Cat Girls Are Ruining My Life.” Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
